section: Act 776 of 2025 — Sec. 31; Sec. 34; Special Language Sec. 1–3
claim_summary: Arkansas Act 776 of 2025 contains FY2026 AOC appropriation line-items for 'Specialty Court/Juvenile Drug Programs' and references Byrne JAG behavioral health collaboration in federal funds sections; special language sections govern conditions/allowable use for these appropriations.
